game.paused: Game Pausing from the client currently does not function.
game.unpaused: Game Pausing from the client currently does not function.
host.serverMode: The Host is in Server Mode!
festival.ending: 2 minutes until the festival is done.
festival.inBed: I will not be in bed until after {{time}}
festival.luau.name: Luau
festival.jellyDance: Dance of the Moonlight Jellies Tonight!
festival.fair.name: Stardew Valley Fair
festival.spiritsEve.name: Spirit's Eve
festival.ice.name: Festival of Ice
festival.winterStar: Feast of the Winter Star Today!
festival.winterStar.name: Feast of the Winter Star
config.serverKeyTT: The keyboard button for toggling the server on and off ('F9' is default)
config.serverAutoTT: Whether the host automatically levels everything to 10 when the server is active (Enabled is default)
config.serverHouseTT: What level of upgrade will the host's house be (0 is default)
config.serverPetTT: Name of the pet ('Qwerty' is default)
config.serverCaveTT: Sets cave as mushroom (enabled) or bat (disabled). Set before run (Enabled is default)
config.serverCCTT: The Host will attempt Community Centre run, disabled will do Joja run (Enabled is default)
config.serverSleepTT: Time for the host to go to sleep automatically (2200 is default)
config.serverChestTT: While servermode is on, players can not access the chests or inventory in other player's cabins (Enabled is default)
config.serverPauseTT: Clients can pause/unpause the server (Disabled is default)
config.serverInviteCodeTT: Copies current invite code to your computer's clipboard once a minute (Enabled is default)
config.serverFestivalsTT: Host will go to festivals automatically (Enabled is default)
config.serverKeySubTitle: (! followed by 1 word with no spaces)
config.serverFestivalWordTT: Set keyword to go to the festival (default 'festival')
config.serverEventWordTT: Set keyword to trigger festival event (default 'event')
config.serverLeaveWordTT: Set keyword to leave a festival (default 'leave')
config.serverUnstickWordTT: Set keyword to unstick a character (default 'unstick')
config.serverPauseWordTT: Set keyword to pause the server (default 'pause')
config.serverUnpauseWordTT: Set keyword to unpause the server (default 'unpause')
config.serverFestivalCDTitle: Festival and Event Count Down Settings
config.serverCDTT: Number of seconds from when the Festival starts until the main event is triggered. Can be manually triggered as well(120 is default)
config.serverFestivalTOTitle: Festival and Event Time Out Settings
config.serverTOTT: How long in seconds to reset server after the {{eventName}} event in case someone gets stuck AFK.(120 is default)
config.serverSpiritTOTT: How long in seconds to reset server after the Spirit's Eve event in case someone gets stuck AFK.(900 is default)
config.serverEndOfDayTT: If the server gets stuck at the 'End of Day' it resets after this amount of seconds to prevent locking up completely(300 is default)
